Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted and Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at LaSalle/Van Buren
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at LaSalle/Van Buren due to an sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at LaSalle/Van Buren due to an sick customer. 

As a result of the delayed train, Pink Line and Orange Line trains will be rerouted to the outer Loop (trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Washington/Wells, Quincy/Wells, LaSalle/Van Buren, State/Van Buren, Adams/Wabash, Washington/Wabash, State/Lake and Clark/Lake).

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
